title: Horrible Knight for a Fight
text: A knight with a vendetta draws their weapon!

title: Wrong turn
text: You stumbled open a dark fortress, as soon as you decide to turn away you get attacked by the Evil Mage

title: What's that in the sky!
text: You hear a loud screech in the sky. Suddenly a griffin lands right infront of you!

title: To Shreds You Say
text: "A bandersnatch, in this place?" you say to yourself before you are torn to shreds. (You got better)

title: A fellow traveler
text: Hey, you don't look so good take this

title: Oh Geralt
text: A shine catches your eye from the ground. As you walk up to take a closer look you see it's a wolf medallion. "Fudge", you say.

title: Wild Gophers
text: A pack of wild gophers gets the jump on you, after an incredibly embarrassing de-pantsing incident you continue your journey.

title: Encantar
text: In the distance you can see someone is approaching quickly. You can't help to notice, how beautiful this attacker is!

title: Take Time
text: You stop to take a moment for yourself. Shutting your eyes, you breathe in deep and slowly release. After a few breaths you carry on.

title: SOAT
text: A one meter tall spider wearing sneakers descends before you!

title: Not this again
text: You are struck from behind with a jar of honey. The sound of pitter-pattering feet and giggling grows distant as a honeybear takes flight and approaches from a nearby cave!

title: Oh Duck
text: A raft of ducks approches you. They seem adorable and you attempt to feed them, but for them, peace was never an option and they take all of your food and dignity.

title: OhWhale
text: You see an empty pier and approach the end of it to take in the fresh sea air. The demon whale, Monstro rises from the water to confront you.

title: Merely a Fleshwound
text: As you walk through the woods you come upon a small creek crossing with an odd-looking figure obstructing the path. Upon closer inspection you realize the figure is the former Champion known as Drogo the Wild who was defeated in a duel with King Arthur, but none of his attitude. You search him and find a potion on his corps.

title: The One Ring
text: You come upon a small pond and spot a shiny gold ring in the bottom, curious you reach into the water and pick it up and call it your precious

title: Pickle Rick
text: You encounter an angry weaponized pickle named Rick

title: Take this!
text: You encounter a gravely wounded traveler, they hand you a potion with nothing but a blank stare

title: Time for a drink
text: You stop in at a nearby tavern and proceed to drink away your sorrows

title: Big Oops
text: You come across a large angry Giant

title: Caravan
text: You come up on a caravan, with a broken wheel. You assist with the repair and you're handed a potion
